channel.title: [PI]Short fix?
channel.description:
Well as u can see there are 2 people staking me and i clicked on one of them, Does anyone know how i can make it so when i try to click on the other one it says " you can't duel someone else while you are challenging someone" [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/o8ezy8.png[/img] If you still don't understand. This is what i want this to do
Okay u see that I Challanged Snoopy. Pure Raped U Dueled me If i click on Pure Raped u snoopy will still see this screen How can i make it so when i click on pure raped u it says "You cant reach that" or something like that.
